34530761.review:
[h1] Обзор GNU/Linux  версии игры [/h1]

Динамичный шутер с видом сверху, где мы в роли бравого коммандоса косим направо и налево супостатов, попутно спасая товарищей попавших в плен к врагу.
Игра кровавая, поверженные враги раскидывают в различные стороны  кишки, сердца, головы и вся эта кровавая вакханалия  приправлена знатными взрывами, разлетающимися на куски частями зданий, машин, ящиков. В итоге на экране творится безумие, главного героя почти не видно. Эта мясорубка приправлена тяжелым роком, что очень сильно добавляет динамичности.

В игре 52 уровня, 6 глав и в каждой главе по боссу. Нам также дают возможность прокачивать главного героя выбирая ему перки(больше жизней, больше урон, дальность стрельбы, бонусы за спасение своих и т.д) при получении нового звания. Хочу напомнить что ГГ несколько и при прохождении открываются новые.

В графическом плане игра похожа чем-то на HotlineMiami.
Ачивки легкие и при желании и усидчивости (перепроходить некоторые уровни для получения количественных достижений) их можно получить все.
Хоть движок игры Unity3d, но игра работает стабильно, вылетов и падений не замечено. Игралось всё на Ubuntu Mate 16.04.3 и ноутбуке с встроенной Intel HD 3000. 
Цена  на момент написания отзыва слегка завышена, но по скидке советую брать!

This is a pretty solid, retro arcade styled, twin-stick shooter.  There is a rain of blood, bullets and explosions at every turn with plenty of destructable landscape and baddies to take out.  The movement and aim is pretty fluid making it easy to get into the action.

There is nothing exceptional to this title but that doesn't prevent it from being a blast, at least in short play sessions.  You do get a handful of different toons to select from.  They all play the same, but you get to level them up and distribute attribute points for each one.  There are also four difficulty settings to play through so you can choose what matches your mood that day.

I think the price of this game is a little high for what it offers, but it's still a pretty fun game.  If you like retro arcade action, then go ahead and get your Rambo on and try out this title!

Kick Ass Commandos delivers everything it promises...Commandos and Ass Kicking...and a few laughs...like a playable, shirtless Vladimir Putin...my personal go to.

KAC is a top down twin stick, arcadey shooter that's big on style from the presentation to the music.  It's fast, fun, and easy to pick up and play whenever you need to kill a couple hundred bad guys in a couple minutes.

There's quite a bit of game here with several selectable, and repeatable missions combined with a dash of customization whereby you assign attribute points to your commandos.

Ultimately, KAC just a dumb, shallow, but extremely fun game.  If you're lookin for something that will help you relax and kill some time, this is a great option.

My one reservation is that I don't feel there's enough game here to warrant the $10 price tag.  I'd definitely wait for a sale, but otherwise, no complaints.

7.5/10

32830148.review:
Kick Ass Commandos is a bright, colourful shoot 'em up that is sadly also shallow and repetitive.

I enjoyed myself for the first two hours.  Ploughing through the enemy with a horde of commandos was immensely satisfying.  As was completely wrecking the scenery with flame throwers and grenades.

But it was only the momentum of that first fun that carried me to the final act.  Kick Ass Commandos gets repetitve fast.  Some have called it a bullet hell shooter but it's not.  The slightly springy camera makes precision dodging difficult.  The enemies bullets are small and fast and don't come in patterns, their only attack style is to shoot straight at the player with some random spread.  

The gameplay leans more to a stats/grind style than a skill based shooter.  The Easy difficulty setting is far to easy but the Elite (second) difficulty requires levelling up health and damage before they can be meaningfully attempted.  The core feature, the Commando companions, is a bit of a gimmick.  There is no way to change their formation except to squish them into walls.  At the beginning of the game they're overpowerd but towards the end they're useless except as brief bullet sponges.

The Commandos get in the way, steal health, trip over mines and get hooked on things.  I found the best option was to go it alone carefully and then come back and rescure them just before completing the stage.  A troupe of elastic skating commandos on the late ice stages is a whole lot less fun than it sounds as they slew wildly into trapped crates and boxes.

Garry, seriously man.  Get out of the way.

There's also number of small annoyances that compound the frustration.  There are no in-game options, there is no music volume control.  The - I assume - store bought muzak tracks are not balanced (and not great either).  I had to quit the stage to turn down some of the louder tracks.

Steam achievements only worked in the first two acts.  The Commandos themselves are all identical with only different skins to distinguish them; there doesn't seem to be a way to respec points after they've been assigned.  Points put into Valor are points wasted.

The game icon is still the default Unity icon.  The Steam overlay doesn't work.  The irritating 'Please give us a positive review' message breaks In-home-streaming if clicked accidentally.  The springy camera makes precision shooting whilst dodging difficult.

All-in-all Kick Ass Commandos isn't terrible but it's only worth getting if it's heavlliy discounted.  You'll probably only put a couple of hours of play time into it before moving on.

30670746.review: Ottimo shoot 'em up a scorrimento con una frenesia ai limiti del bullet hell, ispirato ai classici di un genere che ha vissuto il suo periodo d'oro più di venticinque anni fa. Il gameplay di classici come Commando, Mercs, Shock Troopers, Gundhara e Who Dares Wins viene ravvivato da una velocità d'azione pazzesca, personaggi carismatici che sfottono l'universo dei film d'azione, dettagli ultragore, elementi rpg che permettono di upgradare la nostra squadra e un pizzico di satira politica (i commando Donald e Vlad) che non sta male nelle produzioni indie. Il gioco scorre via divertente, leggero e violento, e la sua struttura non lineare non blocca il giocatore su singole missioni particolarmente difficili, ma anzi spinge a scoprire tutti i livelli per expare la squadra e affrontare i punti di difficoltà dopo aver livellato i personaggi a modino. I livelli sono pieni di nemici assetati di sangue ad ogni angolo, dotati anche di una discreta i.a., ma proprio l'abbondanza di elementi su schermo unita a una realizzazione grafica non esattamente perfetta causa frequenti cali di framerate (problema trascurabile almeno per me, ma da segnalare) fino a dei livelli fin troppo caotici in cui non è sempre chiaro chi ci ammazza e come o addirittura dov'è finito l'omino controllato da noi (problema ben più grave: in qualunque videogioco d'azione 2D l'azione dev'essere decifrabile in pochi decimi di secondo). Inoltre c'è da sperare che nei piani per il futuro di KickAss Commandos ci siano almeno una patch per il multiplayer locale, e forse l'editor di livelli, chiesto da diverse persone nei forum. Il gioco in sé è un po' breve (io ho finito tutte le missioni a difficoltà easy in meno di 8 ore), e non so se in futuro ci saranno dei buoni motivi per rigiocarlo a difficoltà più elevate, ma nonostante ciò mi sono divertito un sacco e la sfida è sempre stata all'altezza: un ottimo prodotto che ha ancora tante potenzialità da far fruttare. Direi che è un acquisto obbligatorio per gli appassionati di sparatutto bidimensionali, e un divertente time-waster per tutti gli altri. Pollice in su meritato.

30670215.review:
Ein richtig cooler & sehr guter Twin Stick Shooter. Es gibt 6 "Mission Packs" mit jeweils 9 Missionen. Man muss die verschiedensten Aufgaben machen z.B mal was Zerstören oder mal jemanden retten usw. Aussgestattet sind wir mit einem Maschinengewehr, in den einzelnen Leveln gibt es dann andere Waffen zum einsammeln, diese gelten allerdings nur als Power-Ups und sind nur für kurze Zeit benutzbar, darunter zählen; Flammenwerfer, Raketenwerfer, Shotgun & Granaten. Zudem gibt es noch Booster die unseren Schaden oder Schnelligkeit erhöhen oder uns kurzzeitig Unverwundbar machen. Es gibt eine ordentliche Anzahl an Gegnertypen darunter verschiedene Arten von Soldaten, Insekten & Yetis und zwischendurch auch den ein oder anderen coolen Boss Fight :) Man bekommt für jeden abgeschlossenen Level auch Erfahrungspunkte und bei jedem Level up 2 Skillpunkte um unseren Commando zu verbessern. Die Achievements sind alle sehr einfach zu bekommen, die meisten bekommt man beim durch spielen automatisch. 2 Erfolge sind etwas langfristig aber durchaus machbar.

+ Viele Level
+ Viele verschiedene Waffen (Power ups)
+ viele verschiedene Gegnertypen
+ Charakter auflevelbar
+ Nette Boss Fights
+ Schwierigkeitsgrad angemessen
+ Coole Musik
+ Guter Sound
+ Mehrere Charaktere Spielbar
+ Sammelkarten
+ Achievements

Fazit: Klare Kaufempfehlung. Ein richtig guter Twin Stick Shooter den ich sehr empfehle. Für mich ein eindeutiges Hidden Gem :)

30068602.review:
Kick Ass Commandos es un shooter con vista top-down, jugabilidad twin-stick y en arte pixelado (si, así bien cortito).

Las mecánicas nos hacen ir rescatando soldados conforme avanzamos en los niveles, ellos fueron capturados por las fuerzas enemigas y es nuestro deber sacarlos de su esclavitud. Cada vez que rescatamos a un NPC, este se une a nosotros, dotándonos de armas extra para seguir tirando balazos y haciendo explotar cosas por doquier; todo lo anterior mientras vamos en busca de nuestro objetivo principal en cada misión. Hay demasiadas explosiones, de hecho ni sabía que Michael Bay hacia juegos, el caos que se deja desenvolver a menudo en las partidas nos hara cerrar los ojos y disparar a lo loco de una manera super chistosa.

Podemos describir a Kick Ass Commandos como muy divertido y un completo caos belico, a veces ni sabremos donde estamos, pero de manera divertida. El número de balas que vuelan por la pantalla crecen conforme vamos liberando prisioneros, esto genera locura y explosiones por todo lado, los entornos cerrados del juego y sus ambientes llenos de cosas explosivas crean situaciones llenas de caos poniendonos en aprietos pues podemos perder compañeros que rescatamos o morir nosotros mismos. 

  “No sabía que Michael Bay hacia juegos.”

Existe a una variedad gran de misiones, personajes, armas, etc. Con un sistema de progresión pequeñito. El audio y la musica del juego son meh, pero ciertamente logran entretener, las explosiones y el desmadre en las balaceras son el atractivo principal del juego.

Este juego es muy claramente un producto en Early Access con un concepto divertido y muy bueno. Pero hay algunos problemas, los compañeros que rescatemos, controlados por la IA tienen problemas de trayectorias, y si no nos devolvemos por ellos, los perderemos.

Algunos de los niveles son dificílisimos, meramente por errores del juego y no por su dificultad, sin embargo, el juego tiene un enorme potencial, si le agregaran cooperativo (local o online) y quizás Steamworks podría convertirse en algo impresionante.

Con controles sólidos, y un futuro que podria ser muy bueno, Kick Ass Commandos podría convertirse en un gran título Indie. Desarrollado por Anarchy Enterprises, el juego tiene un precio de $10 en Steam.

29833533.review:
Для начала, давайте немного окунемся в историю: 1987 год. Фирма SNK делает хитовейший Кооп. боевик под названием Guerrilla War, где нам надо брать на себя бразды управления Че Геварой и Кастро и вершить революцию. Геймплей очень задорный, а вдвоем это была просто сказка, никакая Контра даже рядом не висела (Ну кроме великой Hard Corpse :) ) И вот прошла туева хуча времени и одна малоизвестная фирмочка нашала видать у себя в чулане NES с этой игрой и решила взять за основу сюжет и боевку и вывести все это на новый уровень. А вот что произошло дальше, мы с вами сейчас и узнаем (с) Хрен из Лунтика.
Давайте пожалуй распишем все за и против и в итоге вынесем вердикт данному творению.
Плюсы: 
1. Забавный геймплей. Не ураганный, а просто добротный такой, но без изысков.
2. В меру симпатичная Инди-графика, на сколько это можно вытянуть с кривыми руками из Unity.
3. Возможность поиграть за В.В.Путина
4. Прокачка, не ахти какая, но все же, что является довольно весомым вкладом, как для меня лично.
Минусы: 
1. Первый и один из главных минусов - Нету Коопа, вообще никакого. Только соло, только со своей рукой.
2. Очень сильно тянет бюджетностью, в очень плохом смысле, особенно это хорошо видно по кускам от крокодилов и спецэффектам.
3. Жуткое управление освобожденными солдатами. Что-бы поднять аптечку одному конкретному,скажем из 4рех, освобожденных солдат, приходится откровенно трахаться. Причем удовольствия это явно не доставляет.
4. Очень короткие миссии, нету ни одной дольше 5 минут.
5. Много персонажей, а зачем, если все они отличаются только рожами ? 
6. И самый последний и финальный гроб в крышку: Нулевая реиграбельность. Если только вы не хотите трахаться до 100% ачивок тупо набивая тьму опыта.
В общем и целом, рублей за 70 это можно купить, но дольше пары часов она вас не задержит. А вот за 250 это надо оббегать стороной попутно крестясь и махая кадилом во все стороны. Игра бюджетна до самых кончиков ресниц. Лучше скачайте на эмуль Guerilla War и получите удовольствия в 99 раз больше.

[h1]Pros:[/h1]
[list]

[/list]

[h1]Cons:[/h1]
[list]

[/list]

28649221.review:
C'est bien fait , le jeu est plaisant a jouer et les niveaux contiennent souvent des éléments originaux et amusants.

Je le note négativement parce qu'il manque quand meme de ces petits détails dont on a du mal a comprendre l'absence.

L'impossibilité de recommencer le niveau depuis le menu en jeu par exemple.
Le fait que les difficultés dans lesquelles les niveaux ont été terminés ne soit pas affichées.
Un résumé de fin de partie ridiculement peu fourni.

Quand on termine un niveau le perso utilisé gagne de l'expérience pour le faire monter en grade, ce qui lui fait gagner 2 points a répartir dans la cadence de tir, les dégats, l'armure etc.
Le débloquage de différents personnages a faire évoluer indépendament les uns des autres n'apporte rien sinon de pouvoir évoluer un personnage en répartissant ses points différement, ce qui n'est pas tres motivant.
Pourquoi ne pas leur avoir collé une capacité unique a chacun ou un bonus de statistiques particulier?

Autre détail, impossible de réinitialiser la répartition des points dans un personnage.

Et les ennemis de base qui galerent parfois a contourner les obstacles pour vous tirer dessus c'est un peu dommage aussi.

Le jeu montre trop vite tout ce qu'il a, et ce n'est pas grand chose, c'est pourquoi je ne trouve pas qu'il vaille son prix... Mais l'ayant acheté soldé, je suis tout de même content de l'avoir.

[h1]Klasyczny powrót do strzelanek z lat 90-tych, z lekkim wylewem[/h1]
Jeżeli ktoś z Was grał w Cannon Fodder albo inne strzelanki "taktyczne" z góry, ale ze sporą dawką rozpierdolu ten tytuł może się spodobać. Mamy kilkadziesiąt prostych map opartych o mieszankę top-down shootera, Metal Sluga oraz pikselowej rozwałki. Na mapach nie ma fabuły, nie ma sensu, nie ma... niczego, poza obowiązkiem wybicia przeciwników, ochrony jednego NPC, zbierania powerupów i... ponownego rozpierdolu. Jednym to się spodoba, innym nie bardzo. Główną wadą tej produkcji jest ograniczony content w dniu premiery - kilkadziesiąt mapek przejdziemy moze max w 3 godziny. Mamy system rozwoju bohaterów, co pozwoli na ulepszenia kiedy nie dajemy rady jakiejś mapy zaliczyć. Brakuje tutaj edytora, warsztatu Steam i możliwości tworzenia własnych pikselowo-eksplozyjnych przygód. Warto, jeżeli klimat się podoba, ale jedynie po przecenie do max 5-6€.

28155867.review:
Disclosure: The Developers sent me this game through free on a site called Keymailer, a website for YouTubers/Twitch Streamers to request or be sent Games from Developers/Publishers. However I, nor any other content creator, are not obligated to review/play/promote any game received.

That Being said as someone who isn't really into Retro Games or Top Down Shooters I was actually surprised how much fun I had playing this game. I wasn't foaming at the mouth to play this game as the screenshots aren't super enticing. However what it lacks in traditional gameplay it makes up for in brutality, gore an good old fashioned fun. From the quirky mission titles to the bios of the playable commandos, Every little thing I've seen was fun yet challenging. Also Do not, I repeat Do Not play Fubar difficulty right away, as it is very unforgiving. Another nice little thing was how in the sound menu it is very pro Youtuber as the devs note that they will aid you if anyone trys to claim your video as copyrighted. 

All in all it may not be the best game ever but as someone who isn't super big into 8 bit games I thoroughly enjoyed it.

 7/10 - Play this game for a smashing good time full of barrels, exploding heads and a swift kick in the butt

28137064.review: I don't normally play this type of game, although I do like hack and slash games, so when Anarchy Enterprises offered me a key for this game, I decided to check it out, and I'm glad I did!   The missions are a nice size, not to big, so you can sit down and play this game when you want to play something, but don't have much time.    It supports a controller, but I have had no issues using a mouse and keyboard. The controls work great, and when I die, which happens a lot, it's user error and not due to unresponisve or slow controls.   There are six mission packs with several missions in them.  They are pretty straightforward and the path is fairly linear, so you shouldn't be getting lost.   Surprisingly, you do need to think a bit about what you're doing, as rushing right into the middle of flying bullets, grenades, and rockets with your guns blazing usually does not work out to  well for you!  The music is great, as well, and really fits with the action.  My only issues so far have been that the enemy can shoot you through fences, but you can't shoot them through the fence.   If you're rescuing hostages, or anyone for that matter, they end up wherever they want around you, which is bad for hostages, because if they die, the mission fails.   One way around that is to blast everything in site and clear the area, then go back and gather up the hostages.  There are 4 difficulty levels, Easy, Elite, Extreme, and Fubar!  Overall, I really like the game, and I hope they put out more mission packs in the future.  There is a demo availabe, so check it out and see what you think!

27907955.review:
This is a really fun top down twin stick shooter. The story doesn't matter, it's just rescuing dudes, using them as cannon fodder, and holding down the right trigger until everything else is in pixelated gore on the ground. I was given code for this and have so far played through up to the end of map pack 5, or 45 levels. The level variety is rather good, with objectives beyond 'kill everything that moves', including a couple different vehicle missions. None of the missions take more than 5-6 minutes to complete, so you can pop in, murder a bunch of dudes/alligators/drug zombies/giant bugs/yetis and be done quickly. The game is decently challenging on 'easy', the default setting, and I imagine the 3 higher difficulties are pretty insane. Music is meaty generic rock, but fitting for the type of game it is.

As a bonus, they explicitly include permission on the settings screen for you to make vids and stream the game, which is a nice thing for anyone who makes videos of indie games since sometimes the music isn't youtube safe. 

If you're looking for a good twin stick gun game with SmashTV style powerups and a hint of Broforce oo-rah silliness this might be up your alley. It would be even more fun if there was a local co-op mode, but you can't have everything.

27867576.review: I wasn't paid to play KickAssCommandos, I was sent a key. This means I have no obligation, and therefore can tell the truth. It's great fun. Played BroForce? Enjoyed it? Played Hotline Miami? Enjoyed it? Well, they had a baby called KickAssCommandos. Guaranteed you will love KAC. KAC is like BroForce from Hotline Miami perspective (top down). I enjoy KAC more than BroForce. Rescue a bro and you don't get an extra life, you get a team mate that moves with you and fires when you do. KAC's art is great, being more like Hotline Miami than BroForce, which is fine by me. The sound is great, both effects and music. The game is challenging and addictive (addicting isn't even a word), with good controls and a lot of missions of varying difficulties and types. In summation, I like this game a lot. It's worth the sale price, that's for sure. Maybe not quite worth the full asking price.

23947257.review:
★★★☆☆

Um jogo realmente muito legal, frenético, divertido, não só bom pra passar o tempo, mas onde você eventualmente vai acabar morrendo e ficar tentando novamente e novamente, e ficar repetindo esse ciclo até conseguir. 

Algum que se percebe é que tem um grande potencial, não só por causa do que já entrega, mas do que pode entregar futuramente através de atualizações e melhorias feitas in-game. Justamente por estar em Early Acess, falta algumas coisas ainda a serem acrescentadas, algumas como sugestões vindas da comunidade, outras básicas como conquistas, salvamento na nuvem, cartas colecionáveis e [algum que encaixaria muito bem no jogo que seria] um co-op, porém pelo o que já tem, diverte bastante.

Os gráficos estão muito bonitos, as animações bem feitas, a parte de explosão pode ser melhorada, a trilha sonora é boa, mas falta alguns detalhes pra deixar memorável, e uma diversificada seria ótimo, a jogabilidade está boa, mas precisando dar uma melhorada ainda mais em cima de algumas armas, a IA por parte dos inimigos, como sendo um shoot-em-up, é basicamente deles pularem em cima de você, mas que deveria dar uma requintada nas partes dos minibosses que simplesmente não só marcam você como um alvo e correm para tentar te matar, mas que justamente por isso  podem ser presos em algumas partes do mapa e dando liberdade para o player usar isso como uma vantagem, por parte da squad, a mesma te ajuda, entretanto falta uma maior liberdade para você como líder. O jogo diverte, te ganha algumas horas com a tela no computador e de sobre te trás curiosidade sobre o que vem mais por aí.

[h1]Sugestões:[/h1]

- [b]Básico[/b]: conquistas, salvamento na nuvem, cartas colecionáveis, mais suporte à idiomas e Workshop.

- [b]Melhoria na parte do joystick[/b] 

Eu inicialmente comecei a jogar com o controle e por mais que o jogo já venha pré-configurado, eu senti uma falta de uma opção de configurar os botões. 

Outra coisa também seria a parte de melhorar a jogabilidade em cima dele, a diferença entre teclado@mouse e gamepad é notável, obviamente por ser um shooter, você vai ter mais precisão em cima do mouse, mas em alguns levels, você realmente fica preso pela dificuldade de jogar com o controle já que a falta de precisão bate de frente com o modo frenético do jogo. Não diria necessariamente que isso seja um contra, mas caso os desenvolvedores pensem algum que possa ajudar pra quem joga no controle, seria ótimo.

- [b]Melhoria na squad[/b]

A ideia padrão do jogo é que nativamente você já jogue com um auxílio, você vai resgatando soldados e voluntários durante o level e aos poucos e complementando a sua equipe, tendo ajuda deles principalmente na parte de ataque, porém em alguns casos você se sente limitado por simplesmente eles serem suas sombras em comando. A ideia deles repetirem os seus comandos é boa porque agiliza e mantém o ritmo do jogo, mas em alguns momentos, você vai se ver com algum deles preso em outra sala, pegando um kit médico que seria melhor para outro membro ou até mesmo pra você e até mesmo te atrapalhando pelo fato de ficar colado com você, um sistema de comandos básicos como "fique onde está", "siga-me", "ataque o mais forte", "ataque o mais fraco", "deixe que eu vá na frente", etc., ajudaria muito principalmente em levels mais difíceis do jogo.

- [b]Co-op[/b]

Uma ideia que eu acho que cairia muito bem com o jogo, o modo frenético e até mesmo engraçado que o jogo entrega, encaixaria muito bem em uma gameplay com um (mais ou) amigo, o que com certeza traria um ar mais amplo pro jogo. Algum que seria muito bom em acrescentar seria fases diferenciadas no modo co-op. 

- [b]Workshop[/b]

Eu já tinha citado isso no básico, mas acho que seria bem interessante dar uma liberdade para a comunidade poder brincar e até se aventurar em criar fases para o jogo.

- [b]Atualizações, atualizações constantes[/b]

Obviamente agora em período de Early Acess o que mais queremos são atualizações, como já tinha dito ali em cima, o jogo encanta não só pelo que tem, mas pelo que pode entregar, então atualizações com inovando sempre no jogo e trazendo algum mais amplo e que torne a jogabilidade sempre mais divertida, não só cairia como uma luva, mas seria algum ideal para esse jogo.

*Caso surja algum na minha mente (e consecutivamente algumas dessas sugestões forem adicionados ao jogo), irei editando a review.

- - - - - -- 

Para terminar, só tenha a declarar que está em um nível muito bom para um jogo em Acesso Antecipado, o que não significa que o que temos é o suficiente, mas que é um ótimo começo pra construir um jogo esplêndido futuramente.

Um jogasso, altamente recomendado para jogadores que gostam de ação no estilo top down shooter em que você é um atirador que deve cumprir alguns objetivos como vasculhar cenários com armas quebrando caixas, resgatando seus parceiros, dando uma pequena sensação de nostalgia com seus gráficos e jogabilidade. 

Ainda em early access, o jogo tras muita diversão e por enquanto não muitos levels, mas que promete com toda certeza uma boa gama de opções no futuro. As fases são alternadas, e os objetivos são sempre variados, tornando o jogo ainda mais legal e menos enjoativo. Isso o torna ainda mais viciante. 

A trilha sonora realmente é muito boa também. Além de trazer muito sangue, mas muito mesmo e alguns momentos engraçados, o jogo com certeza vale o seu investimento. E como ele é  frequentemente atualizado, isso quer dizer, logo sairá a versão final, é o que todos esperam. O ruim dele é que poe enquanto não dá cartinhas e nao tem um multiplayer, mas isso seria um plus ao jogo!

Prós
+Graficos
+Preço
+Trilha Sonora
+Diversão
+Sangue
+Viciante
+Fácil

Contra
- Multiplayer
- Poucas fases no early access

Nota 8/10

21927759.review:
Another one of those games that needs something in between "thumbs up" and "thumbs down".

A very nostalgic trip to my days of playing Contra or Ikari Warriors, with a bit of mindless shooting and blowing things up. This game would have been a smash in the 80s, but lacks the polish to hold it's head high in this era. It's certainly no Tiny Troopers or even Cannon Fodder.

Yes, it's early access and things could change, but I think it's core will always be the same and that's what lets it down. There's nothing really original in this game. The enemy have no AI or pathfinding, so you can't lure them around corners, instead they just run from where they are to where you are and if something is in the way then they'll run on the spot until you move.

An extra point; It would be nice to use pick ups as secondary weapons to use when you wanted, rather than having them become your sole weapon for a limited time.

This game has potential, but I think it's going to be crippled by it's engine.

Good crazy fun game with tons of action and a retro style which still has few problems:

21488591.review:
[h1]Un shooter très sympa[/h1]

[i][u]Kick Ass Commandos[/u][/i] c'est quoi ? C'est tout simplement un top down shooter à l'ancienne qui ne se prend pas au sérieux une seule seconde. Vous arrivez vous tirez, ça pète de partout, le sang gicle, les boyaux recouvrent le sol; bref ça vole peut-être pas haut mais c'est vraiment bon. Tout est là, les graphismes avec un style pixelisé, la bande son rock, les gros flingues, les références, bref tout ce qu'il faut pour passer un bon moment.

L'early access du jeu est encore jeune et il faudra attendre un long moment avant de pouvoir toucher à la version complète du titre, mais en tout cas en ce qui me concerne même si je n'ai pu jouer qu'au premier pack de mission je dois dire que j'ai pris un plaisir fou ! Le seul problème c'est qu'a l'heure actuelle la durée de vie du titre n'est que de 45 minutes ce qui est très faible...

Au final le jeu pour le moment n'a pas énormément de contenu ou du moins pas suffisamment pour valoir son prix initial de 7,99€ mais si vous décidez de lui donner sa chance sachez que vous ne serez pas déçu c'est super cool, le fun est instantané et dans le futur le jeu sera tout simplement un must. Tout ce qu'il manque c'est plus de contenu, des succès Steam et surtout un mode coop en ligne.

21471678.review:
找回FC时代俯视角射击游戏感觉得作品。
忘记是哪个慈善包里的游戏了，买来后就没玩过。
今天偶然间整理库存分组的时候，发现像素画风和俯视角射击挺有趣。商店里的视频也看得热血沸腾。
于是马上下载游戏后，玩了一会儿，太过瘾了。
仿佛一下子把我带回了二十年前的某个下午。
赤色要塞，古巴战士等等这类俯视角射击游戏给我的童年带来太多的回忆了。

简单的说说这游戏吧。
除了最常规的各类弹药的设定外，游戏最大的特色是解救人质。
但不同于赤色要塞救人质加分，被解救的人质会成为队友为你突（dang）突（pao）突（hui）。
不同人物似乎有不同的能力和背景，不过我英语不好，看不懂……
射击感觉非常爽快，尤其是吃到炸弹和飞弹之后，满屏幕的爆炸，鲜血和人头。
另外，关卡的设定也比较有意思，并不是一尘不变的模式，不通关卡间面临的问题和过关的方法也会有区别。

以上是优点，下面说说缺点。
缺点就是敌人AI太低，经常卡在原地打不到人，或者你靠近他才会有所行动。
虽然游戏主打的是爽快感，但这样糟糕AI的敌人也是对玩家智商的侮辱啊。
期望开发商能后续的版本中提高敌人AI。

如果你也因为买慈善包而入了这款游戏，希望能下载下来好好体验下。

19063932.review:
This game is very clearly EA, it's a good concept, and it is fun. but there ARE some problems, Some animations just default to "Sliding" around at random, many AI teammates just "Run" backwards into eternity, so if you don't pick em up, they're gone, and oh my frigging GOD if I get killed during a cutscene again I'm gonna lose it, because yes, oh yes friends THEY CAN SHOOT YOU....even if you can't move.   Plus some of the levels are Waaaaay to hard, either due to poor design (i.e. Gators just Spearheading you for an insta kill, and you being unable to avoid them due to the terrain, or because they just "appeared", though that may be a graphical error...).  and general buckshot it damn near un-killable without grenades.

However the game has MASSIVE potential, local/internet co-op and workshop support (Levels, Chars, Weps...Total conversions maybe, mission editing and scripting) would make it a pure gem, and some fine tuning of weapons and terrain would be a godsend.  This game is like Ikari Warriors on the NES (But this game controls so much better), the controls are solid, and the current string of things is appropriate for a new game like this, it's worth the $10, I waited 'till the sale ended to pay for the game. 

Is it worth $10 in it's current state? Yes
Is it perfect? Hell no
Remember Ikari Warriors? No? Well play this anyway
Can it be made better? Absolutely
Will it? Most likely as the issues are just a set of minor ones that compound it to 1 big one.
It's a fun shmup remniscent of the NES era long past, I'm glad I bought this game, and I'm glad the devs are working on it!

And for the love of ANYTHING dear to you Play the Demo, it's free, that way if you don't like the game...don't bitch about it, however if you want to be part of something interesting, and blowing things to pieces is your thing, BUY IT!...oh yeah, and the organs of your enemies? They slide around and blood trails everywhere...even better!

18919204.review:
Keiner schreibst irgend etwas? Dann mal hier ein paar erste Eindrücke von mir.

[u]Allgemein:[/u] Daumen hoch - mit Vorbehalten.

Der Ablauf: Grundsätzlich ein Twin-Stick-Shooter im Pixellook. Man rennt, ähnlich wie bei "Commando" (C64), "Rambo" (C64) oder "Dogs of War" (Amiga), per Draufsicht durch eine weitgehend zerstörbare Landschaft und ballert mit Anleihen an Bullethell-Shooter fleißig herum bis man den vorgegebenen Endpunkt erreicht hat. Nebenbei sammelt man gefangene Kameraden (fast möchte ich "Bros" sagen) ein, die dann wie die Eier bei "Yoshi's Story" als Kette am Spieler mitlaufen und ebenfalls fleißig ballern. Nebenbei das übliche Aufsammeln von Power-Ups, Health usw. Als Soße obendrauf gibt es viel derselben - also die große Schlachtplatte mit reichlich Splatter.

Das macht schon Spaß, aber es fehlt der letzte Schliff und es wird - wie so oft - unnötig Potenial verschenkt. Denn: 

[olist]
[*]Die Musik ist leider ein völlig belangsloses Gitarrengeschruppe und sofort vergessen. Da hat man am falschen Ende gespart - die oben genannten Titel und heute "8 days" machen das viel besser und sind mir bis heute, fast 30 Jahre später (C64), noch im Ohr. Die Waffengeräusche mit Rückschlag und der Rumms bei Explosionen sind aber kräftig und gut gelungen.

[*]Die eigenen Mannen und die Gegner sprechen wenig oder nicht, was viel Atmosphäre verschenkt. Nur eine Art Ansager bellt ab und zu markige Sätze. Mit ein bisschen Glück kann man mit guten Sprachsamples aber riesig Bekanntheitspunkte machen und auf ewig in Erinnerung bleiben, man denke an die unvergesslichen Samples in Terminator ("Hasta la vista, baby!") oder etwa Shadow Warrior ("You're half the man you used to be!").

[*]Die Übersicht im Spiel finde ich nicht besonders gut und sie wird vom übertriebenen Splatter noch gestört. Hier wäre weniger mehr gewesen und vielleicht etwas Rauch, Feuer oä. interessanter.

[*]Die Gegner spawnen unrealistisch und warten oftmals brav, bis man den Triggerpunkt berührt, um sich erst dann im Bewegung zu setzen. Dazu sind sie häufig relativ doof, oft taub und zugleich manchmal so kampfeslustig, dass sie z.B. übereifrig schon die Wände mit ihren Messern bearbeiten. Sie wirken ein bisschen wie Zombies. Hmmpfh, na ja.

[*] Das Spiel scheint außerdem nicht fertig, sondern ist laut Titelbildschirm im "Early Access Alpha 0.0.20", was Steam vorausschauenderweise aber so nicht aufführt. Wirkt auf mich persönlich nicht eben gut und weckt nur wenig Vertrauen. Weiter werden dort allerlei Level und eine Kampagne angekündigt. Am besten hätten die Devs noch "Entschuldigung..." drangeschrieben. Immerhin: Einer der "Early Access"-Level ist aber wohl komplett spielbar und bietet eine Art Ablauf-Baumstruktur mit 18 Untermissionen, um so einen Wiederspielwert zu schaffen. Vermutlich ist das Budget super knapp und die Devs versuchen gerade, mit diesem Verkauf das Geld für die nächsten Level reinzuholen.
[/olist]

[b]Technisches:[/b] An meinem Mac Mid 2014, 16GB, SSD, Intel Iris mit Mavericks und XBox-Controller läuft das Spiel bisher problemlos. Im Startbildschirm ist jedoch der Controller nicht benutzbar.


[b] Fazit:[/b] Das Spiel ist schon ok und ich finde es erfreulich, dass sich Indies diesem altehrwürdigen Genre widmen. Schade, dass aber die sich bietenden Möglichkeiten nicht genutzt werden. Ich persönlich wünsche mir zur Abwechslung mal ein Revival, das mich vom Hocker haut. Lauwarme Titel gibt's genug.
